medium: 146 political badges of various shapes and sizes pinned on a T-shirt with a silkscreened image of Mao Zedong in pigtails by Zhang Hongtu
dimensions: badge: 3.2 cm. h (1 1/4 in.) x 2.15 cm. w (7/8 in.); overall: ca. 77 x ca. 90 cm. (30 5/16 x 35 7/16 in.)

texts.textentryhtml: –2009 Collection of Zhang Hongtu (Woodside, NY), by gift to the Princeton University Art Museum, 2009.

Rectangular 3.2 cm h x 2.15 cm. w. Gold scribed border; in upper half, gold granulated background behind a circle with Mao’s head floating against a ruby ground with starburst pattern.  In lower 1/3, starting from the right: a plant sprig, a book “毛泽东选集”, and a red 5-point star, with white enamel showing on underside for pages (showing thickness of book); the wheel of a ship (?) appears behind & to the left of the book; a machine gun (?) is underneath all this; bottom portion of badge = in all gold, against ruby striated (fine, horizontal) ground (like a table surface).
Back: small round indentation between fasteners for clasp, which sits 1/3 from top. Below = e lines of inscription: “毛主席万岁/万万岁” ; “中国    广东” ; “ 1[enclosed with a circle]”.

caption: Chinese, Modern period (1912–present), Mao badge from Guangdong. 146 political badges of various shapes and sizes pinned on a T-shirt with a silkscreened image of Mao Zedong in pigtails by Zhang Hongtu; 3.2 x 2.2 cm (image). Gift of Zhang Hongtu (2009-19.124)
